requirements.summary: Create a hero section with welcoming headline, brief introduction about the coaching services, and a call-to-action button
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is prominently displayed at the top of the page
Headline clearly communicates the coaching value proposition
Call-to-action button is visible and encourages user engagement

file_operations.description: Create Hero component with welcoming headline, coaching services introduction, and call-to-action button. Wire in the generated hero background image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-coaching.dim_1920x1080.png as a background. Use shadcn/ui Button component for the CTA.
Import and render the Hero component at the top of the main page layout to ensure it displays prominently when users visit the site.

requirements.summary: Build a services section displaying at least 3-4 coaching service offerings with descriptions
acceptanceCriteria: Services are presented in an organized grid or card layout
Each service includes a title and description
Section is visually distinct from other page sections

file_operations.description: Create Services component displaying 3-4 coaching service offerings in a grid/card layout. Use shadcn/ui Card components for each service entry, with title and description. Ensure visual distinction from other sections using spacing and styling.
Import and render the Services component below the Hero section to display the coaching service offerings on the main page.

requirements.summary: Create an about section explaining the coaching approach, methodology, and philosophy
acceptanceCriteria: About section provides clear information about coaching methodology
Content builds trust and establishes credibility
Section is easily readable and well-formatted

file_operations.description: Create About component explaining the coaching approach, methodology, and philosophy. Wire in the generated growth icon at frontend/public/assets/generated/growth-icon.dim_256x256.png to visually represent personal growth. Use clear typography and layout for readability and trust-building.
Import and render the About component below the Services section to present the coaching methodology and philosophy.

requirements.summary: Implement a contact form with fields for name, email, and message to enable client inquiries
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes required fields: name, email, and message
Form validates user input before submission
Submitted inquiries are stored in the backend
User receives confirmation after successful submission

file_operations.description: Create ContactForm component with name, email, and message fields. Use shadcn/ui Input and Textarea components. Implement frontend validation for required fields and email format. Call backend.submitContactForm on submission and display success/error messages. Show confirmation feedback after successful submission.
Import and render the ContactForm component below the About section to enable client inquiries through the contact form.

requirements.summary: Design a testimonials or social proof section to build credibility
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section displays client feedback
Layout accommodates multiple testimonial entries
Design enhances trustworthiness of the coaching services

file_operations.description: Create Testimonials component displaying client feedback in a layout that accommodates multiple entries. Wire in the generated testimonial background at frontend/public/assets/generated/testimonial-bg.dim_800x600.png to enhance the trust-building design. Use shadcn/ui Card components for individual testimonials.
Import and render the Testimonials component between the About and ContactForm sections to showcase social proof and build credibility.

requirements.summary: Apply a warm, professional visual theme with cohesive color palette, modern typography, and inviting layout that conveys trust and approachability for a coaching business
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses warm, professional tones that avoid blue and purple
Typography is readable and conveys professionalism
Overall design creates a welcoming and trustworthy impression
Visual style is consistently applied across all sections

file_operations.description: Update global CSS to define a warm, professional color palette (avoiding blue and purple). Set modern, readable typography. Apply consistent spacing and layout styles that create a welcoming and trustworthy impression across all sections.

Extend Tailwind theme with custom warm color tokens (e.g., warm oranges, earthy tones, soft neutrals) and professional typography settings. Ensure the color palette avoids blue and purple, and configure spacing/layout utilities for consistent application across components.
